definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I also use intensively a seeing pin to add multiple small holes.
sentences.chinese: 我也特意使用锥子在枪身上钻一些小洞。

sentences.english: Therefore, i order to eliminate drowsiness, Shu Qin kept an awl by his side.
sentences.chinese: 苏秦为了驱除睡意，便将一把锥子放在身边。

sentences.english: If there is a wind, it knifes through your skin like stilettos.
sentences.chinese: 如果有风，也会如锥子一般刺穿你的皮肤。

sentences.english: This is because I show you this awl today.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为我到今天才叫您看到这把锥子。

sentences.english: Again he drove the awl and needle into her.
sentences.chinese: 他便又一次掏出锥子和针，要扎她。

sentences.english: Baba Mustapha was seated with an awl in his hand, just going to work.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴木沙发坐着手里拿着一个锥子，正在工作。

sentences.english: Please don't use that knife as a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 请不要把那把刀当锥子来用。

sentences.english: I used the awl with the broken handle.

definition: to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
